name: AirbnbSearch
tool_description: Search information from airbnb Short-term rental and housing informationoutside China

api_list.name: search_property_by_place
api_list.description: This function takes various parameters to search properties on Airbnb.

required_parameters.name: place
required_parameters.description: The name of the destination.

return_data.name: property
return_data.description: a list of at most 3 properties, containing id, name, and address.

api_list.name: get_property_details
api_list.description: This function retrieves the details of a property given its ID.

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the property.

api_list.name: check_availability
api_list.description: This function checks the availability of a property given its ID.

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the property.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: The date to check, it must in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

return_data.name: availability
return_data.description: The availability of the property for the given date or the next 10 days.

api_list.name: get_property_reviews
api_list.description: This function retrieves the reviews of a property given its ID.

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the property.

return_data.name: reviews
return_data.description: The reviews of the property, containing comment, rating, and date. At most 3 reviews are returned.

api_list.name: get_property_checkout_price
api_list.description: This function retrieves the checkout cost of a property given its ID and check-in date.

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the property.

required_parameters.name: checkIn
required_parameters.description: The check-in date, it must in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

required_parameters.name: checkOut
required_parameters.description: The check-in date, it must in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

return_data.name: accommodationCost
return_data.description: The accommodation cost of the property.

name: ArxivSearch
tool_description: Search information from Arxiv.org Useful for when you need to answer questions about Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Quantitative Biology, Quantitative Finance, Statistics, Electrical Engineering, and Economics from scientific articles on arxiv.org

api_list.name: get_arxiv_article_information
api_list.description: Run Arxiv search and get the article meta information.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: the content of search query

return_data.name: content
return_data.description: a list of 3 arxiv search papers, including published date, title, authors, and summary

name: BINGMap
tool_description: Plugin for look up map information in American

api_list.name: get_distance
api_list.description: Get the distance between two locations in km.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start location.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end location.

api_list.name: get_route
api_list.description: Get the route between two locations in km.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start location.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: The end location.

return_data.name: route
return_data.description: the route, a list of actions.

api_list.name: get_coordinates
api_list.description: Get the coordinates of a location.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: the location need to get coordinates.

api_list.name: search_nearby
api_list.description: Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.

required_parameters.name: search_term
required_parameters.description: the place name

return_data.name: places
return_data.description: the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.

api_list.name: send
api_list.description: send email

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: the email address to send

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: title of email, not NULL

api_list.name: show
api_list.description: show the emails in the inbox

required_parameters.name: only_unread
required_parameters.description: whether to show only unread emails in the inbox

return_data.name: emails
return_data.descriptions: a list of emails in the inbox including sender, title, content, and time

api_list.name: write_file
api_list.description: write file to disk

required_parameters.name: file_path
required_parameters.description: The path of the file.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text needed to write.

api_list.name: read_file
api_list.description: read file from disk

required_parameters.name: file_path
required_parameters.description: The path of the file.

name: FilmDouban
tool_description: Search movie information from douban providedUseful for when you need to find information about current movies and upcoming movies in China

api_list.name: coming_out_filter
api_list.description: prints the details of the filtered [outNum] coming films in China

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: the region of search query, and the parameter must in Chinese.

optional_parameters.name: cate
optional_parameters.description: the category of search query, and the parameter must in Chinese.

return_data.name: film
return_data.description: a list of film information, including date, title, cate, region, wantWatchPeopleNum, link

api_list.name: now_playing_out_filter
api_list.description: prints the details of the filtered [outNum] playing films now in China

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: the region of search query, and the parameter must in Chinese.

return_data.name: film
return_data.description: a list of film information, including date, title, cate, region, wantWatchPeopleNum, link

api_list.name: print_detail
api_list.description: prints the details of a movie, giving its name

required_parameters.name: film_name
required_parameters.description: target movie's name, must be in Chinese

name: FilmTMDB
tool_description: Plugin for look up films at TMDB

api_list.name: search_movie
api_list.description: Search for movies by their original, translated and alternative titles

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: the title of the movie

return_data.name: id
return_data.description: movie ID of the searched movie

api_list.name: get_movie_details
api_list.description: Get the top level details of a movie by ID

api_list.name: get_similar_movies
api_list.description: Get the similar movies based on genres and keywords

return_data.name: films
return_data.description: list of reviews including user's name, rating, and reviews

api_list.name: get_movie_reviews
api_list.description: Get the user reviews for a movie

return_data.name: reviews
return_data.description: list of reviews including user's name, rating, and reviews

api_list.name: get_now_playing
api_list.description: Get a list of movies that are currently in theatres

return_data.name: films
return_data.description: list of films playing, including id, title, release date, popularity and rating

api_list.name: get_top_rated_movies
api_list.description: Get a list of movies ordered by rating

return_data.name: films
return_data.description: list of films ranked by rating, including id, title, release date, popularity and rating

api_list.name: get_popular_movies
api_list.description: Get a list of movies ordered by popularity

return_data.name: films
return_data.description: list of films ranked by popularity, including id, title, release date, popularity and rating

name: GaodeMap
tool_description: Plugin for look up map information only in China

required_parameters.description: coordinate of the start location, format with 'lon,lat'

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: coordinate of the end location, format with 'lon,lat'

return_data.name: route

return_data.name: coordinate
return_data.description: coordinate of the location, format with (lon, lat)

required_parameters.name: location

required_parameters.name: keywords

return_data.name: places

return_data.name: title

return_data.name: organic_id

required_parameters.description: unique ID of the author

return_data.name: articles

return_data.name: citation

api_list.name: get_author_id
api_list.description: The getAuthorId function is used to get the author's id by his or her name.

required_parameters.name: mauthors

name: ReserveMeeting
tool_description: plugin for booking meeting, with rooms 101, 102, 103

api_list.name: get_room_status
api_list.description: get the room booking status

return_data.name: rooms
return_data.description: list of rooms as well as its booking status

api_list.name: get_empty_room_with_time
api_list.description: if they are any rooms available in the provided time

required_parameters.name: start_time
required_parameters.description: the start booked time, must be in 24 hour format, e.g. 13:15

required_parameters.name: end_time
required_parameters.description: the end booked time, must be in 24 hour format, e.g. 22:21

api_list.name: reserve
api_list.description: Book the meeting room today using the room id provided by `check_empty`

required_parameters.name: room_id
required_parameters.description: the room you want to book

required_parameters.name: start_time
required_parameters.description: the start booked time, must be in 24 hour format, e.g. 13:15

required_parameters.name: end_time
required_parameters.description: the end booked time, must be in 24 hour format, e.g. 22:21

api_list.name: get_curr_time
api_list.description: get current time

return_data.name: time
return_data.description: the time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format

api_list.name: get_weekday
api_list.description: get the weekday today

name: PPT
tool_description: create ppt slides with text, paragraph, images, with good looking styles

api_list.name: create_file
api_list.description: Create a pptx file with specific themes

required_parameters.name: theme
required_parameters.description: the theme used

required_parameters.name: abs_location
required_parameters.description: the ppt file's absolute saving location

api_list.name: get_image
api_list.description: Get an image given keywords from Internet, return the image path

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description: the comma separated keywords to describe the image

return_data.name: picture_url
return_data.description: the file path to the searched image

api_list.name: add_text_page
api_list.description: Add text page of ppt

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: the title of the page

required_parameters.name: bullet_items
required_parameters.description: bullet_items should be string, for multiple bullet items, please use [SPAN] to separate them.

api_list.name: add_text_image_page
api_list.description: Add a text page with one image. Image should be a path

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: the title of the page

required_parameters.name: bullet_items
required_parameters.description: bullet_items should be string, for multiple bullet items, please use [SPAN] to separate them.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: the path of the image

api_list.name: save_file
api_list.description: When all steps done, YOU MUST use save_file() to save PPT

name: Weather
tool_description: look up weather information in at most 3 days

api_list.name: get_weather_today
api_list.description: get today's weather

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: the location name

api_list.name: forecast_weather
api_list.description: forecast weather in the N upcoming days

required_parameters.name: days
required_parameters.description: the N number of days later, maximum N is 3

return_data.name: results
return_data.description: list weather forecast of N days, including date, overall weather and temperature

api_list.name: search_stock_ticker
api_list.description: get the stock ticker given the company name

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: search for terms within the ticker and/or company name

return_data.name: ticker
return_data.description: The exchange symbol that this item is traded under

api_list.name: aggregate_stock_with_time
api_list.description: get aggregate bars for a stock over a given date range in custom time window sizes

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the stock/equity

required_parameters.name: multiplier
required_parameters.description: The size of the timespan multiplier

required_parameters.name: timespan
required_parameters.description: The size of the time window, supported 'day', 'hour', 'week'

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The start of the aggregate time window with the format YYYY-MM-DD

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: The end of the aggregate time window with the format YYYY-MM-DD

return_data.name: results
return_data.description: list of dict including the open and closed price in the given time period and the unix msec timestamp for the start of the aggregate window

api_list.name: get_daliy_open_close
api_list.description: get the open, close and afterhours prices of a stock symbol on a certain date

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The exchange symbol that this item is traded under

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the requested open/close in the format YYYY-MM-DD

api_list.name: get_ticker_news
api_list.description: get the most recent news articles relating to a stock ticker symbol

optional_parameters.name: ticker
optional_parameters.description: Return results that contain this ticker

return_data.name: results
return_data.description: A list of news including title, summary, and author

api_list.name: get_ticker_detail
api_list.description: Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it

return_data.name: description
return_data.description: A description of the company and what they do/offer

return_data.name: list_date
return_data.description: The date that the symbol was first publicly listed
